2502.16503.title: FanChuan: A Multilingual and Graph-Structured Benchmark For Parody Detection and Analysis
2502.16503.paper_summary:
Parody is an emerging phenomenon on social media, where individuals imitate a
role or position opposite to their own, often for humor, provocation, or
controversy. Detecting and analyzing parody can be challenging and is often
reliant on context, yet it plays a crucial role in understanding cultural
values, promoting subcultures, and enhancing self-expression. However, the
study of parody is hindered by limited available data and deficient diversity
in current datasets. To bridge this gap, we built seven parody datasets from
both English and Chinese corpora, with 14,755 annotated users and 21,210
annotated comments in total. To provide sufficient context information, we also
collect replies and construct user-interaction graphs to provide richer
contextual information, which is lacking in existing datasets. With these
datasets, we test traditional methods and Large Language Models (LLMs) on three
key tasks: (1) parody detection, (2) comment sentiment analysis with parody,
and (3) user sentiment analysis with parody. Our extensive experiments reveal
that parody-related tasks still remain challenging for all models, and
contextual information plays a critical role. Interestingly, we find that, in
certain scenarios, traditional sentence embedding methods combined with simple
classifiers can outperform advanced LLMs, i.e. DeepSeek-R1 and GPT-o3,
highlighting parody as a significant challenge for LLMs.
2502.16503.paper_summary_zh: 模仿是社群媒體上新興的現象，個人模仿與自身相反的角色或立場，通常是為了幽默、挑釁或爭議。偵測和分析模仿可能具有挑戰性，且通常依賴於背景，但它在理解文化價值觀、推廣次文化和增強自我表達方面扮演著至關重要的角色。然而，模仿的研究受到可用資料有限和現有資料集多樣性不足的阻礙。為了彌補這個差距，我們從英文和中文語料庫中建立了七個模仿資料集，總共有 14,755 個註解使用者和 21,210 個註解評論。為了提供足夠的背景資訊，我們也收集回覆並建構使用者互動圖形，以提供更豐富的背景資訊，這是現有資料集所缺乏的。有了這些資料集，我們在三個關鍵任務上測試傳統方法和大型語言模型 (LLM)：(1) 模仿偵測、(2) 帶有模仿的評論情緒分析，以及 (3) 帶有模仿的使用者情緒分析。我們廣泛的實驗顯示，與模仿相關的任務對所有模型而言仍然具有挑戰性，而背景資訊扮演著至關重要的角色。有趣的是，我們發現，在某些情況下，傳統的句子嵌入方法結合簡單分類器可以優於先進的 LLM，即 DeepSeek-R1 和 GPT-o3，突顯模仿是 LLM 面臨的重大挑戰。
